block.p: Jennifer Rachel Meyer, the daughter of Sheila M. Zaslower and Robert L. Meyer, both of New York, was married last evening to Jason Douglas Krauss, a son of Cassie and Elliott N. Krauss of Matawan, N.J. Rabbi Ari Fridkis officiated at the Altman Building in New York.

Mrs. Krauss, 30, is a coordinator in the human resources department at Bolt.com, a Web site for teenagers in New York. She graduated cum laude from Dickinson College. Her mother is a consultant and her stepfather, Philip M. Zaslower, is the managing director at PML Furniture Group, an office furniture sales company in New York that they once owned. The bride's father is the president of Ehrlich Meyer Associates, an investment management concern in Bedford Hills, N.Y. The bride is the stepdaughter of Ellen A. Meyer. The bride's grandmother, Helen H. Meyer, retired as the president of the Dell Publishing Company in New York.

Jennifer Rachel Meyer, the daughter of Sheila M. Zaslower and Robert L. Meyer, both of New York, was married last evening to Jason Douglas Krauss, a son of Cassie and Elliott N. Krauss of Matawan, N.J. Rabbi Ari Fridkis officiated at the Altman Building in New York.

Mrs. Krauss, 30, is a coordinator in the human resources department at Bolt.com, a Web site for teenagers in New York. She graduated cum laude from Dickinson College. Her mother is a consultant and her stepfather, Philip M. Zaslower, is the managing director at PML Furniture Group, an office furniture sales company in New York that they once owned. The bride's father is the president of Ehrlich Meyer Associates, an investment management concern in Bedford Hills, N.Y. The bride is the stepdaughter of Ellen A. Meyer. The bride's grandmother, Helen H. Meyer, retired as the president of the Dell Publishing Company in New York.

Mr. Krauss, 28, is a lawyer at the New York City Human Resources Administration. He graduated from Pennsylvania State University and New York Law School. His mother teaches art at the Solomon Schecter Day School of Essex and Union, a private school with locations in Cranford and West Orange, N.J. His father is a purchasing manager in Somerset, N.J., with Merck & Company, the pharmaceutical concern.
